sentences.en: Bellicose: Warlike in manner or temperament; pugnacious.
sentences.cn: 好战的: 在行为方式或性格上好战的; 好斗的.

sentences.en: Laziness makes people irascible, and Xiangzi now grew pugnacious.
sentences.cn: 懒,能使人脾气大.祥子现在知道怎样对人瞪眼.

sentences.en: My normally easygoing personality turned pugnacious.
sentences.cn: 我惯常随和的性情变得暴躁了.

sentences.en: The professor had been pugnacious and irritable.
There were also pugnacious certainties guaranteed to incite the war's critics.
sentences.cn: 其中好战的言论肯定能激怒战争评论家.

sentences.en: When he was a child , he was pugnacious and fought with everyone.
sentences.cn: 他小时候很好斗,跟每个人都打过架.

trans.tran_cn: 好战的，好斗的，好挑衅的
trans.tran_en: very eager to argue or fight with people
